title: Jason Ferruggia - Renegade Cardio 2012 NEW VERSION
description:

ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the kind of training that gives you Ã¢â‚¬Å“the look.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ It also gives you the stamina of a world champion fighter.

Burn 3x the Fat in a Third of the Time

RenegadeCardioImages5 

Each Renegade Cardio finisher takes ten minutes or less and burns three times more fat than regular cardio.

TheyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re designed to be done immediately after your regular strength training workout but you can also do them as extra conditioning sessions on off days or use them in hotel rooms when youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re on the road traveling.

And unlike the monotony and boredom of the treadmill or stairclimber to nowhere theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re actually fun.

I donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know about you but if training isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t fun IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m not into it.

If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve got a partner or two to train with some of the finishers can be made into a competition to raise the stakes.

With Renegade Cardio you get 52 different fast fat-burning finishers including:

Ã¢â‚¬Å“One in the ChamberÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½- A collection of finishers based on only one exercise or training implemRenegadeCardioImages1 ent.

Battling Ropes & Jump Ropes- Low impact circuits that produce awesome results.

Pyramids- One of my favorite conditioning methods and definitely not for the weak of heart.

And you can get it all for LESS THAN TWENTY BUCKS!

Step up to the challenge of Renegade Cardio and get ripped today.
